title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Observed Behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
Expected Behavior: On the first attempt, the selected item should be successfully highlighted and selected.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select an item (e.g., a label) by clicking on it.

Note: On the second attempt, the item can be selected as expected.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: On the second attempt, the item can be selected as expected.
